channel.title: Julia A. Schnabel | Computational Imaging and AI in Medicine

item.title: Three papers accepted at MICCAI 2025 Main Conference
item.description:
• Temporal Neural Cellular Automata: Application to modeling of contrast enhancement in breast MRI
    Daniel Lang, Richard Osuala, Veronika Spieker, Karim Lekadir, Rickmer Braren, Julia Schnabel
    (https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.18720)

  • Influence of Classification Task and Distribution Shift Type on OOD Detection in Fetal Ultrasound
    Chun Kit Wong, Anders Christensen, Cosmin Bercea, Julia Schnabel, Martin Tolsgaard, Aasa Feragen

  • Lightweight Data-Free Denoising for Detail-Preserving Biomedical Image Restoration
    Tomáš Chobola, Julia Schnabel, Tingying Peng

item.title: German Radiological Society Awards the Alfred Breit Prize to Prof. Julia Schnabel
item.description:
The Alfred Breit Prize 2024 of the Radiological Society was awarded to Prof. Julia Schnabel, Professor at the Technical University of Munich and Director at the Institute of Machine Learning in Biomedical Imaging at Helmholtz Munich. The prize honors outstanding work in the research of radio-oncology.

More information here and here.

item.title: Deep Learning for Retrospective Motion Correction in MRI: A Comprehensive Review
Süddeutsche Zeitung Interview with Prof. Julia Schnabel
item.description: Interview with Prof. Julia Schnabel by Süddeutsche Zeitung about artificial intelligence in clinical practice. Available online here
